ing: 1/2 cup white sugar, or to taste
6 cups water, or more as needed
des: "Refreshing blueberry limeade is prepared with fresh blueberries, lime juice, and sugar. Serve cold over ice. Stir well before serving."
ins: Blend blueberries, sugar, lime juice, and 1 cup water together in a blender; pour into a pitcher. Add remaining water and stir.
